caption.title: The Snohomish River Basin, Washington State (USA), showing the Skykomish River sub-basin, with major and minor river bodies.
caption.p: BIP was modeled in the entire Snohomish Basin and validated using survey data from the Skykomish sub-basin. Input data to inform model variables was derived from stream segments in the Snohomish watershed, but excluded the Skykomish sub-basin where model validation occurred.
